featured.text: Glenn began the day with decorating the Rockefeller Center Christmas tree.
American presidents can express their individual style in how they decorate the house and in how they receive the public.
When holding a dinner party, some large restaurants or hotels will use an ice sculpture to decorate the table.
According to Mayor Tiberi, Paris will be decorated mostly by .

definition.en_def: To make something look more attractive by adding items or features.
definition.example: We decided to decorate the living room with new curtains and paintings.
